EmailTemplate.name: Email Change Instruction
EmailTemplate.subject: Instructions to modify email address
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
These instruction should help you change the email address associated with Vericent and allow authentication to the"My Compensation" tab in Salesforce.com. Please read below and follow the instructions.
For General Requests For requests to change, create or delete a Generic Inbox, a Distribution List, a Security Group or a Service (SVC) Account, or for any general submission that cannot be done through the automated process, please use the ‘Information Security Request’ option. Follow this procedure below; Click on the Account Courier link from ‘Quick Links’. Then click 'Information Security Request' Choose an 'other' from the drop down menu. Type in comments, include user ID and email address that needs to be updated to. Submit request. We need this submitted for audit records.
